meanings.definition: Gathered or formed into a rounded mass.
meanings.sent1: The conglobed snowflakes created a beautiful snowball.
meanings.sent2: The conglobed clouds floated lazily in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The conglobed candies in the jar looked like colorful marbles.
meanings.sent4: The conglobed thoughts in his mind finally cleared up.
meanings.sent5: The conglobed petals of the flower formed a perfect circle.

meanings.sent1: The conglobed stars in the sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent2: The conglobed ants worked together to build their nest.
meanings.sent3: The conglobed toys on the shelf seemed to be having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The conglobed students in the classroom listened attentively.
meanings.sent5: The conglobed leaves on the ground rustled in the wind.
